custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'STATUS' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'STATUS' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'PRICE_TOLERANCE_TYPE' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'PRICE_TOLERANCE_FREQUENCY' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?';

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION FROM HELPER_TABLE HL WHERE LIST_NAME = 'PRICE_TOLERANCE_INTERVAL' AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

SELECT COUNT( DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IP JOIN PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS ON PS.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION FROM ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IP JOIN PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS ON PS.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID) FROM PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?'

SELECT DISTINCT HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID,HL.DESCRIPTION FROM PS_CONTRACT_DETAILS PS JOIN HELPER_TABLE HL ON HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID = PS.PS_CONTRACT_ATTACHED_STATUS AND HL.DESCRIPTION like '?' GROUP BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID, HL.DESCRIPTION ORDER BY HL.HELPER_TABLE_SID OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;
